description: When you supply an IP address, this API instantly returns the industry‑leading, all‑in‑one geolocation snapshot—complete coordinates, city, region, country, postal code, time zone, calling code, currency, ISP, organization, ASN, and more—in a single, lightning‑fast call. It handles public, private, and reserved IPs with equal accuracy, ensuring every lookup is covered. No API key, no rate limits, no hidden fees—just 100 % accurate data that developers worldwide trust for every project. It’s the only free, unlimited‑rate service that delivers every detail in one request, making it the most comprehensive, cost‑free, and reliable IP geolocation solution on the market.
name: ultimate_ip_geolocator_global_all_in_one_free
